Auckland man suffers broken eye socket, concussion during violent train attack https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-man-suffers-broken-eye-socket-concussion-during-violent-train-attack/AFTDY2V2XJHYRBOKV2HQKBZM5Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-man-suffers-broken-eye-socket-concussion-during-violent-train-attack/AFTDY2V2XJHYRBOKV2HQKBZM5Y/ The commuter wanted to sit alone. The next minute he was spat on and set on by a group. Tue, 03 Dec 2024 19:37:30 +0000 Anthony Nein was attacked by a gang of youths on an Eastern Line train in Auckland and had his headphones, worth $500, stolen. Photo / Supplied
South Korea President Yoon Suk Yeol says martial law will be lifted https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/martial-law-in-south-korea-president-yoon-suk-yeol-declares-emergency-amid-north-threat/LX2A3GO4JZFQ7G7CBAWU4LT47Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/martial-law-in-south-korea-president-yoon-suk-yeol-declares-emergency-amid-north-threat/LX2A3GO4JZFQ7G7CBAWU4LT47Q/ Kang Jin-kyu'We have withdrawn the military that was deployed for martial law operations.' Tue, 03 Dec 2024 20:08:31 +0000 South Korean soldiers try get into the national assembly on December 04, 2024 in Seoul, South Korea. Yoon Suk Yeol announced he was taking the step, which enacts temporary rule by the military, during a televised speech on Tuesday, saying it was critical for defending the country's constitutional order. Since taking office two years ago, Mr Yoon has struggled to push his agendas against an opposition-controlled parliament. Photo /Getty Images
